body: Bruh thanks for the info though
Damn you ruined it for me. I just want to appreciate some pure teenage love

I've seen the translated version of this manga in a different website. There are four chapters missing from the one posted here, and the last one completely ruins the story. Apparently their teacher saw the boy and girl 1 fucking in the park, and from that he blackmails girl 1 into not only having sex with him, but also suggests that all three kids become sex slaves for him and his friends. For whatever fucking reason all three kids later discuss this as if it were nothing. "Oh, the teacher raped you?" "Yeah, it was good though. His dick was bigger than yours". Bruh. But that's not even the worst part. The keep fucking down to the last chapter, but in the last two pages one of the kids narrates the story and tells us that all three of them eventually graduated and never saw each other again. What a load of shit. At least they reported the teacher.
